descriptionHtml:
Lite Ebony Armor v1.0

Please endorse if you use it.  

Adds forging and tempering recipes for a light armor version of the ebony armor.  It uses whatever textures you have installed for the regular ebony armor.  

Same stats and recipes. It just exchanges the lightarmor tag in place of heavyarmor, and reduces the weight more in line with other light armors.


Craft it at the forge under Ebony.  


===========================================================
Install  
===========================================================

UnZip into data folder

OR

Download and install with Nexus Mod manager


===========================================================
Check out all my mods:  
===========================================================
